description: the Department of National Defense is looking to procure expansion joint pipe for use at two navy bases.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

Government Sector Preliminary Award NeoLearn Expansion
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Reference:** PW-22-01012372
**Tender Status:** Expired
**Publication Date:** November 3, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2022, 14:00:00

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Description of Procurement:**
---------------------------

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the procurement of expansion joints and pipes. The goods are to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

**Item 1:**

* Expansion Joint, Pipe (GSIN: 4730, NSN: 99-812-6828)
	+ Quantity: 25 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt
* Part No.: PA1947, NCAGE: 36718
* Part No.: RB 9318/0500, NCAGE: K6455

**Item 2:**

* Expansion Joint, Pipe (GSIN: 4730, NSN: 99-812-6828)
	+ Quantity: 25 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax
* Part No.: PA1947, NCAGE: 36718
* Part No.: RB 9318/0500, NCAGE: K6455

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Documents:**

The tender documents are available in English and French on the Canada Buys website [link to Canada Buys website]. The bid submission deadline is December 13, 2022, 14:00:00.

**Contact Information:**

For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:

Normandin, Jean-Pierre
jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
